snippet.title: Xatrom Command - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Xatrom Command is a top-down shooter 9Ratones and Leaf Team Games. Players will fight waves of invading aliens to contain the catastrophic breach and destroy the eggs to prevent any further contamination. Engage with an arsenal of weapons ranging from standard-issue military firearms to experimental energy weapons. Xatrom Command is available now on PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #XatromCommand
